verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Iyelele iyele iyele iyele,
Iyelele iyele iyele iyele,
tazama inavyopendeza
ndu-gu kuishi pamoja
kwa upendo,

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
huku tukisaidianakatika
shida mbali mbali za maisha,
(Hilo ndilo pendo kamilifu,
pendo alilotuachia Yesu) x2.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tuthami-ni maisha
ya wezetu wanonge,
tuwatu-nze yatima wazee
na wajane.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tuthami-ni maisha
ya wenzetu wanyonge,
tuwatu-nze Yatima wazee
na wajane.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Msaa-da na kwa watoto
wa mitaani,
msaa-da kwa wakimbizi
wa nchi zote.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Msaa-da kwa wote wasio
na chakula,
msaa-da kwa yeyote asiye
na nguo.
